name: Strong Winds
description: Strong wind currents lift and swirl everything in the air, from a tiny pebble to a giant truck. You are either being swept around or falling straight to the floor at a great speed.
effect:
- Flying-Types can Roost without having to Land.
- Electric, Ice and Rock Type Moves deal neutral damage to Flying-Type Pok√©mon.
- Hazards are cleared on set and cannot be set during the duration.
